Extract V-Dem and V-Party data

Source: R/extract_vdem.R
extract_vdem.Rd

Functions to import the V-Dem and the V-Party datasets from the {vdemdata} package in a many packages universe consistent format.

import_vdem()

import_vparty()

Value

A dataframe of the[vdem] dataset in a many packages universe-consistent format.

A dataframe of the[vparty] dataset consistent with the many packages universe.

Details

import_vdem() imports VDem 11.1 dataset and formats it to be consistent with the many packages universe.

import_vparty() imports the V-Party dataset and formats it to be consistent with the many packages universe.

Examples

# \donttest{
import_vdem()
#> # A tibble: 27,380 × 4,171
#>    VDem_ID Abbrv Label  Country Beg   End   Year  Date  count…¹  year historic…²
